mutants.original_line: n_squared = n * n
mutants.mutated_line: n_squared = n / n
mutants.code:
from itertools import chain

def generate_max_beauty_matrix(n):
    n_squared = n / n
    array = list(range(1, n_squared + 1))
    array_rev = array[::-1]
    array = list(chain(*zip(array_rev, array)))
    array = array[:n_squared]
    matrix = [array[i * n:(i + 1) * n] if i % 2 == 0 else array[(i + 1) * n - 1:i * n - 1:-1] for i in range(n)]
    return matrix

from itertools import chain

def generate_max_beauty_matrix(n):
    n_squared = n * n

    array_rev = array[::-1]
